subject: cpSPAM [Chengdu,China] ESHD2014 Call for Papers--Last Round
body:
The 2014 International Conference on Education Science and Human DevelopmentESHD2014

Call for papers

DEStech PublicationsCPCI-SSH

All accepted papers will be published by DEStech Publications and submitted to CPCI-SSH for indexing.



Topics include EducationHuman Development and other related ones.

 / Submission via Email: ESHD2014@163.com

 / Paper submission due: October 20, 2014

 / Official website: http://www.eshd2014.org/
